channel.title: Juggle Harper Cell College Politic on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Paul Wellstone
item.description: When I was in college, my friends and I juggled for a bill bradley rally. It was great fun and we met paul wellstone there. It is unfortunant that he has died. He was a good person and an excellent politician. Anyway.. here are some pictures
